title: Warlock
content: Spell List. Level 2 Choose 2 Eldritch Invocations (Class Feature) Additional Spell Slot (Class Feature) Level 3 Pick 1 Pact Boon (Pact of the Chain, Pact of the Blade or Pact of the Tome) (Class Feature) Improved Warlock Spell Slots Choose 1 additional Spell up to 2nd Level from the Warlock Spell List. Level 4 Choose 1 additional Warlock Cantrip (Class Feature) Feat - Choose one from the Feats list Level 5 Deepened Pact (Class Feature) Choose 1 additional Eldritch Invocations (Class Feature) Imp
